name: Bullets talk faster
description:
I saw someone asking about FPS genre: "How can this be fun? You just shoot things." and, well, this happened.

Source code on Github (Raconteur engine)

If you see any typo, bug or just a weird bit of phrasing please let me know in the comment section.

Betatesting credits: Kie Kazuki, udivas.

Special thanks to h.zomb for his invaluable suggestions during the alpha phase.
